alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 01 at 1:06AM MST until April 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Northwest Deserts including Kingman. In California, Morongo Basin, Cadiz Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Northwest Deserts
